summary: A man visits a frontier town seeking to avenge his brother's murder.
cast: Rosemary Clooney|Jack Carson|Guy Mitchell|Pat Crowley|Gene Barry|Cass Daley|Frank Faylen|Reginald Owen|Buddy Ebsen|Richard Hale|Joanne Gilbert|Pat Blake|Joan Corbett|Frank Cordell|Lorinne Crawford|Alvin Burke Deer|Melvin Blake Deer|Maxine Gates|Herb Golden|Rand Harper|Ethan Laidlaw|Judy Landon|Sylvia Lewis|Kermit Maynard|Anthony Numkena|William Roberts|Elizabeth Slifer|Tony Taylor|Walter Tetley
title: Red Garters
